headlines.description: — Jack Quinn gave Buffalo the lead for the first time this season with a shot that missed the net and still went in, and the Sabres had two more...
headlines.shortLinkText: Sabres beat the Senators 8-4 for their first victory of the season.

events.name: Florida Panthers at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Cam Talbot made 21 saves, Mason Appleton scored twice and the Detroit Red Wings beat Florida 4-1 on Wednesday night to send the defending champion Panthers to their second straight loss.
headlines.shortLinkText: Red Wings beat Panthers 4-1 to send defending champs to second straight loss

events.name: Chicago Blackhawks at St. Louis Blues

headlines.description: — Lukas Reichel had two goals and an assist, and the Chicago Blackhawks pounded the St. Louis Blues 8-3 on Wednesday night for their second straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Reichel scores twice as the Blackhawks beat the Blues 8-3 while playing without Foligno

headlines.description: — JJ Peterka and Barrett Hayton scored second-period goals, Karel Vejmelka made 19 saves, and the Utah Mammoth beat the Calgary Flames 3-1 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mammoth beat Flames 3-1 in home opener
